extendedInfo.description: Defence Discount Service is the only official Ministry of Defence discount provider for the Armed Forces and Veterans.  The new official Defence Discounts Application allows members to get discounts on the go both on-line and on the high street.  With guaranteed savings across a whole host of categories everyone can save with the Defence Discounts App.  Using the service members can save up to 25% on food, 20% on clothing, 40% on hotels and holidays, Â£1000âs on cars and much more...You can benefit from this service if you are: - Armed Forces Personnel- Reserved Forces - Veterans - Spouses/Partners (of serving personnel)- MOD Civil Servants - Bereaved Family Members- War/Service Widow(er)s- Cadet Forces (over 16 years of age)- NATO Forces serving in the UKFeatures:- Simple registration process to access the offers- Quick and easy access to all on-line and high street offers- Use the inbuilt map to find offers available around you- Apply for the Defence Privilege Card through the app- Latest offers of the week directly to your handset- Shake your device to receive a random offer - 3D Defence Privilege Card built into the app- Shop on-line and save through the appSo if you are part of the Defence Community, download the app and start saving today.Defence Discount Service, Supporting the Armed Forces Community.If you require any support please contact us at: contact@defencediscountservice.co.uk.  As this is a new mobile application we understand there may be a few bugs.  We can respond quickly and more directly through email rather than leaving support queries in reviews which can get missed.

reviews.title: Hmmmm!
reviews.comment: Works now ive got update thank god! But the update keeps repeating everytime I turn phone on, xperia t
reviews.author: Mark Sexton

reviews.title: Not a good start!
reviews.comment: 6.5Mb for 4 info pages is a bit much, I\'ll keep with my plastic card, thanks. Better now working.
reviews.author: Steve Pink

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Force closes every time I try to open it. Never even made it past the sign in page.
reviews.author: Simon Howell

reviews.title: Log in error
reviews.comment: Cant log in on s3...says email doesnt exist but when trying to re register says already registered...please help.
reviews.author: Jon Mcdonald

reviews.title: Rubbidh
reviews.comment: Downloaded but will not open correctly. Gets to sign in screen then crashes. Might as well remove it!
reviews.author: Bill Rigby

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Good idea but doesn\'t work a and just crashes at login screen. Installed, uninstalled and rebooted s3 but same problem.
reviews.author: Julian Bailey

reviews.title: Just doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Black, blank screen and nothing more. Would seem that this app simply doesn\'t work, either that or it\'s very selective about which phones it wants to work on!! Shame as DDS is a top discount provider, just need to provide an app that works now!!  Several updates later and the app still doesn\'t work. Blank screen time after time. Tried uninstallaing and re-installing, still no joy. Running Orange\'s San Diego smart phone, says the phone is compatible but obviously not the case. Still well disappointed. would be no star\'s if that was an option, but it isn\'t. Uninstalled and re-installed again today (04.09.13) still doesn\'t work. Complete waste of time.
reviews.author: Kevin Lewis

reviews.title: Has a bug with passwords
reviews.comment: Sorted this out now but be aware you will need at least 6 digits in your password to use the mobile version so you may need to change your password on line to the six digits the easy way would be to make people use six digits at least when registering on a PC works good now but could do with a search option on here and on the PC version
reviews.author: Mick Cotter

reviews.title: What it should have been.
reviews.comment: This App has now been updated to a useful tool. What it should have been before it was released.
reviews.author: Gary Stevens

reviews.title: Unable to log in
reviews.comment: When I try and log in it says alert email not recognised.  However I can log in fine on my laptop. Thanks for the reply. I have already got in touch and it appears I have downloaded the wrong app as this one is strictly for MOD. I have been informed that there is an app coming though. Thanks
reviews.author: Shane Day

reviews.title: Not recieved e-mail
reviews.comment: Can\'t open the app as I haven\'t received the confirmation e-mail. Please send the e-mail so I can use the app.
reviews.author: Claire Bradshaw

reviews.title: Thanks it is now working well
reviews.comment: When is this app going to be updated? Been waiting a month now!!! This is good app now
reviews.author: Walter Watson

reviews.title: Difn\'t work - but now that it does...
reviews.comment: Won\'t accept my password - just keep getting error pop up. Using galaxy s4 Uodate - Now works fine - very impressive
reviews.author: Tracey Leslie

reviews.title: Appreciated
reviews.comment: great app and discounts, thanks for helping the armed forces
reviews.author: james samuels

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: Can\'t log in using Samsung Galaxy S3.  Just get \"error\" everytime even though detils are correct.  Tried uninstall then installed again.     Update has fixed this.  A good app.
reviews.author: Gavin Baker

reviews.title: Works fine now thanks.
reviews.comment: Works fine now after the latest fix. Thanks.
reviews.author: Dave Kay

reviews.title: Dennis Cook
reviews.comment: the latest version is now working on my phone thanks. very quick response to the problem
reviews.author: dennis cook

reviews.title: Great app; saved some cash already!
reviews.comment: Loaded on a Samsung Galaxy S3, didn\'t have any problems and saved some cash through a link already!
reviews.author: V Kash

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work on Nexus 10. Tried reinstalling and still nothing. All I get is the log in screen but that\'s it! All that is available to me is the sign in box the rest of the screen is blank  Still nothing, I can click on blank boxes and bring up the registration page etc but I can\'t see what I\'m typing in the text boxes.
reviews.author: Elliott Brett

reviews.title: Can\'t login
reviews.comment: I have previously registerred with a mod email address but the app does not recognise it. Dont know if any good or not
reviews.author: Darren Grey
